allow: Bash(node -p "var d=require\(''dotenv''\);d.config\({path:''.env.local''}\);var v=[''SENDGRID_API_KEY'',''QUOTE_TO_EMAIL'',''QUOTE_FROM_EMAIL'',''POSTGRES_URL'',''DATABASE_URL''];v.map\(function\(k\){var val=process.env[k];return val ? k+'': SET \(len=''+val.length+''\)'' : k+'': NOT SET''}\).join\(''\\n''\)")
